CustomField.inlineHelpText: If yes, what were the reasons the person was transferred to another location? (choose all that apply):
CustomField.label: Reasons for transfer

value.fullName: Policies of the facility where the person was located
value.label: Policies of the facility where the person was located

value.fullName: Availability/capacity/comfort of practitioners within the facility where the person was located
value.label: Availability/capacity/comfort of practitioners within the facility where the person was located

value.fullName: Privileges not available at time or at all to practitioners at facility of patient
value.label: Privileges not available at time or at all to practitioners at facility of patient

value.fullName: Person requested a transfer to an alternate location
value.label: Person requested a transfer to an alternate location
